sentences.english: I learnt to jive there when they got the jukebox.
sentences.chinese: 他们安了自动点唱机后，我在那儿学会了跳摇摆舞。

sentences.english: To entertain her, he also created the flash jukebox.
sentences.chinese: 招待她，他也创建闪光自动点唱机。

sentences.english: At least it's more interesting than a jukebox.
sentences.chinese: 至少比点唱机有趣多了。

sentences.english: A record collector played some goodies for me on his record player.
sentences.chinese: 一位收藏家用他的唱机为我播放了几张好东西。

sentences.english: He bought a microwave oven9 a10 to a CD player.
sentences.chinese: 除了CD唱机外，他还买了一台微波炉。

sentences.english: Rear phono socket inputs for Phono.
sentences.chinese: 后方唱机插座输入唱机。

sentences.english: Rear phono socket inputs for Phono.
sentences.chinese: 后方唱机插座输入唱机。

sentences.english: In other words this CD player plays CDs.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，这个CD唱机能够播放CD碟。

sentences.english: The waiters mime to records playing on the jukebox.
sentences.chinese: 侍者们配合自动唱机里播放的唱片对口型假唱。

sentences.english: Total Control Theory could also be called the jukebox theory of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 完全控制理论也可以被叫做情绪的自动唱机。

sentences.english: Sometimes the juke box would come on; sometimes you could hear voices and laughter coming from the bar.
sentences.chinese: 有时候是唱片点唱机，有时是从酒吧传来的谈笑声。

sentences.english: He got up, put some money in the jukebox, then sat back down.
sentences.chinese: 他起身，给点唱机了塞了钱，坐回来。

sentences.english: They will compare notes about cartoons, Nickelodeon, or prime-time programming.
sentences.chinese: 他们会就卡通，点唱机或者黄金档节目交换意见。

sentences.english: Can you pass me the CD player?
sentences.chinese: 你能递给我那个激光唱机吗？

sentences.english: A tango was playing on the jukebox…
sentences.chinese: 点唱机播放着一首探戈舞曲。

sentences.english: sometimes you could hear voices and laughter coming from the bar.
sentences.chinese: 有时候是唱片点唱机，有时是从酒吧传来的谈笑声。

definition: hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. to 音響|音响[yin1 xiang3]
